instruction: Generate a persuasive argument for why fast food is healthy.
output: Fast food can be a healthy option if it is prepared in the right way. Most fast food restaurants now offer healthier options such as grilled or baked foods instead of fried foods. These options are much lower in fat and calories and can provide the same great taste without the guilt. Additionally, many fast food restaurants offer salads and other vegetable-based options, which are rich in essential vitamins and minerals that are necessary for optimal health. Finally, fast food restaurants are typically much quicker and more convenient than preparing a meal at home, allowing those on the go to maintain a healthy, balanced diet.
